item.title: Event & Music Website
item.description: User interface design for an event listing page for an undisclosed client. The functionality and design are focused on displaying simple event information ordered by date and time. Developed on a fluid grid the page rearranges, according to the browser width, down to mobile devices.
item.content:encoded: User interface design for an event listing page for an undisclosed client. The functionality and design are focused on displaying simple event information ordered by date and time. Developed on a fluid grid the page rearranges, according to the browser width, down to mobile devices.

item.title: Oceanic: Swell
item.description: Oceanic: Swell attempts to address our subconscious and conscious fears of the wild by evoking the sublime in nature. The viewer is positioned at the base of the oceans swell, at the mercy of the water, with waves threatening to break and swallow the viewer. Ideas of fear and vulnerability are also stimulated in the Swell series by eliminating context through the absence of horizon, land and depth in the image. This distorts our sense of size, scale and gravity and creates an infinite space in the piece so that we feel and reflect upon our size in the world. The perspective presented in the Swell series is in contrast to the intimate viewpoint presented by the Keyhole, Horizon and Surface series.
item.content:encoded: Oceanic: Swell attempts to address our subconscious and conscious fears of the wild by evoking the sublime in nature. The viewer is positioned at the base of the oceans swell, at the mercy of the water, with waves threatening to break and swallow the viewer. Ideas of fear and vulnerability are also stimulated in the Swell series by eliminating context through the absence of horizon, land and depth in the image. This distorts our sense of size, scale and gravity and creates an infinite space in the piece so that we feel and reflect upon our size in the world. The perspective presented in the Swell series is in contrast to the intimate viewpoint presented by the Keyhole, Horizon and Surface series.

item.title: DOOMED
item.description: Fake documentary about the life and habits of non-terrestrial creatures that coexist 24hrs with a Narrator in an indeterminate habitat. Unlike terrestrial animals, whose instincts are focused on survival, the nature of these creatures seems to condemn them to a loss of time and energy and eventually, to an absurd and comical extinction.
item.content:encoded: Fake documentary about the life and habits of non-terrestrial creatures that coexist 24hrs with a Narrator in an indeterminate habitat. Unlike terrestrial animals, whose instincts are focused on survival, the nature of these creatures seems to condemn them to a loss of time and energy and eventually, to an absurd and comical extinction.

item.title: Vision Magazine China
item.description: Fashion collaboration project with photographer Yin Chao and Editor Ujin Zhao for Chinese fashion magazine Vision. These collages are inspired by the work of the late Lee Alexander McQueen for a special edition issue about this talented fashion designer. Ashkan Honarvar has incorporated different aspects in this series that relate with the work of Lee Alexander McQueen. Like the fascination with animals and motion, but also showing contradictions between strength and fragility.
item.content:encoded: Fashion collaboration project with photographer Yin Chao and Editor Ujin Zhao for Chinese fashion magazine Vision. These collages are inspired by the work of the late Lee Alexander McQueen for a special edition issue about this talented fashion designer. Ashkan Honarvar has incorporated different aspects in this series that relate with the work of Lee Alexander McQueen. Like the fascination with animals and motion, but also showing contradictions between strength and fragility.

item.title: Scenaria - corporate identity & design
item.description: Two design levels present the character of Scenaria, Inc., a leader in analytics-based strategic planing. Reduced black and white illustrates analytic thinking and professionalism. Full-color visuals bring playful elements into the complex world of data. The comma in the new name Scenaria, should be seen as an opening-up towards the future. CREDITS Client: Scenaria, Inc. Creative direction: Mike Fuisz Art direction and graphic design:Kurt Glänzer Strategic advice: Kirsten Ives Director digital: Birgit Taucher Visuals: Eno Henze Project management: Angela Pilz Product photography: Marion Luttenberger
item.content:encoded: Two design levels present the character of Scenaria, Inc., a leader in analytics-based strategic planing. Reduced black and white illustrates analytic thinking and professionalism. Full-color visuals bring playful elements into the complex world of data. The comma in the new name Scenaria, should be seen as an opening-up towards the future. CREDITS Client: Scenaria, Inc. Creative direction: Mike Fuisz Art direction and graphic design:Kurt Glänzer Strategic advice: Kirsten Ives Director digital: Birgit Taucher Visuals: Eno Henze Project management: Angela Pilz Product photography: Marion Luttenberger

item.title: Gaudi Chair & Stool
item.description: The shape of the Gaudi Stool was created in the same way that Antoní Gaudi designed the structure of his churches, by making a model of hanging chains, so letting gravity determine the strongest and most logical shape for withstanding forces. High-end techniques and materials were used to be able to apply Gaudi's methods in lightweight furniture.
item.content:encoded: The shape of the Gaudi Stool was created in the same way that Antoní Gaudi designed the structure of his churches, by making a model of hanging chains, so letting gravity determine the strongest and most logical shape for withstanding forces. High-end techniques and materials were used to be able to apply Gaudi's methods in lightweight furniture.

item.title: Liverpool English Pub
item.description: While working on project it was very important to show the connection between our brand and traditional England. Especially with its famous town Liverpool. Thats why weve started from analysis of history and key elements of towns name and logo. Alexander Andreyev: «The symbol of Liverpool is The Liver Bird. This bird is like legendary Phoenix and Sirin birds there were no such a thing in real life, however, scientists still argue what kind of extinct birds could be its prototype. By itself Liver is a symbol not only of Liverpool town, its also main part of logo of very famous English football club. The second part of the citys name means the water because the city is located near the sea». Artyom Kulik: «After analysis stage weve found three main elements that need to be combined in a logo: The Liver Bird, location near the sea and heraldic style used in Britain during the birth of Liverpool. This has become the basis for the logo and identity of the brand at all».
item.content:encoded: While working on project it was very important to show the connection between our brand and traditional England. Especially with its famous town Liverpool. Thats why weve started from analysis of history and key elements of towns name and logo. Alexander Andreyev: «The symbol of Liverpool is The Liver Bird. This bird is like legendary Phoenix and Sirin birds there were no such a thing in real life, however, scientists still argue what kind of extinct birds could be its prototype. By itself Liver is a symbol not only of Liverpool town, its also main part of logo of very famous English football club. The second part of the citys name means the water because the city is located near the sea». Artyom Kulik: «After analysis stage weve found three main elements that need to be combined in a logo: The Liver Bird, location near the sea and heraldic style used in Britain during the birth of Liverpool. This has become the basis for the logo and identity of the brand at all».

item.title: URSIDES
item.description: Photographe autodidacte et maquilleuse, je voue une passion insatiable à lautoportrait, que je qualifie de quête identitaire à jamais inachevée. "Ursides" est une série où mes deux passions fusionnent et donnent naissance à une pluie d'étoiles filantes. Self-taught photographer and make-up artist, I dedicate an insatiable passion to self-portrait, which I qualify as for ever unfinished search for identity. "Ursides" is a serie where my two passions merge and give birth to a rain of falling stars.
item.content:encoded: Photographe autodidacte et maquilleuse, je voue une passion insatiable à lautoportrait, que je qualifie de quête identitaire à jamais inachevée. "Ursides" est une série où mes deux passions fusionnent et donnent naissance à une pluie d'étoiles filantes. Self-taught photographer and make-up artist, I dedicate an insatiable passion to self-portrait, which I qualify as for ever unfinished search for identity. "Ursides" is a serie where my two passions merge and give birth to a rain of falling stars.
